name: PDF Reader for Android: PDF Viewer 2020

PDF orientation: Vertical and horizontal views provide the most convenient experience for you - Optional display horizontally, vertically, mobile ...  PDF Reader and PDF Viewer 2020 is a great, simple, convenient and fast application. It supports you all that you need for a pdf reader application.  - Best pdf reader - Simple interface easy to use - Pdf document reader, pdf viewer free, pdf reader free, xps file viewer - This is comic book apps free, ebook reader for android free and ebook and pdf reader  Pdf reader for android free download - Free pdf reader for android   Other features we still working on and will update on next version   - PDF Compressor: Lets you compress PDF documents and reduce file size - Merge PDF: Merge pdf documents together. - PDF Creator: Draw and type directly on PDFs - Split PDF: Easily split your pdf files - Scan to PDF: Scan everything as images or PDFs. - Annotate PDF: Annotate PDFs with others in real time - Convert PDF: Convert PDF to DOC, TXT, PPT, WORD, JPG, PNG, XLS and many more - Print to PDF: Makes printing easy
